description: Numerators in Stirling expansion of middle binomial coefficient.
comments: a(j) exactly divisible by 2^([ binary digit sum of j ]-1) (see reference)
references: R. Richberg, D. E. Knuth (independently), Problem 6581: The asymptotic expansion of the Middle Binomial Coefficient, Amer. Math. Monthly, 97 (7) 1990, 626-630.
D. B. Tyler, D. Hickerson, unpublished correspondence, 1985-8; cf. above reference.
author: _Len Smiley_
